mainHeader.title: Saluton!
mainHeader.par00: We are honored to announce that finally, there is an initiative to organize the 1st Philippine Esperanto Youth Congress to be held in the year 2020. This historic congress shall mark the culmination of the seven years of effort of Esperanto advocates in the country and the forward step towards the further growth and integration of the national Esperanto community, and shall provide speakers, learners, and advocates coming from different parts of the country the opportunity to interact, learn, and work together in a series of social and educational activities.
mainHeader.par01: In line with this, the conveners of the Congress would like to start the preparations by launching an open call for individuals which shall become members of the local organizing committee (LKK), which shall consist of seven (7) members. To this end, we are currently in need of three (3) individuals who shall take charge of each one of the following posts.

qualifications.title: Qualifications
qualifications.par00: Anyone interested must have at least the following qualifications:
qualifications.list01: Is firmly committed to ensure the success of the congress through proper delivery of responsibilities expected of the post within prescribed deadlines
qualifications.list02: Is willing to communicate and coordinately actively with other members of the LKK and all other personnel involved with the preparation for the congress
qualifications.list03: Has any prior experience or training relevant to the post assigned, especially for Finance (preferably professional or has related educational background), otherwise, is willing to actively familiarize himself/herself and learn new things related to the post
qualifications.par01: Furthermore, the following qualifications are preferred but not required:
qualifications.list04: Resides within the National Capital Region (NCR) or in the immediately surrounding areas (except for Logistics and Finance, in which proximity is required), and is ready to allot time to participate in physical meetings at least once a month
qualifications.list05: Can be easily reached through email, social media, and/or SMS, whichever is most convenient
qualifications.list06: Possesses at least basic (A2) or higher proficiency in Esperanto, especially for particular posts whose tasks may require periodic communication with the international Esperanto community, such as External Relations & Marketing and Finance; and is willing to continue learning the language during the time before the congress
qualifications.list07: Has prior experience in event organizing
qualifications.par02: It should be clarified, however, that the posts will not handle the work alone, but will be aided with assistance from the conveners and volunteer staff throughout the whole preparation period for the congress and during the congress itself.

vacancies.title: Vacant Positions
vacancies.par00: Please click on the positions to view the qualifications.
vacancies.par01: For those who are interested, kindly completely fill-up the application form. For those who still have reservations (i.e. unsure whether they satisfy the qualifications above, etc.), we strongly encourage you to apply nevertheless and we shall exhaust all means to find agreeable solutions.

sec.title: Secretary
sec.list00: records and archives the minutes of the meeting of the LKK
sec.list01: receives and archives contracts signed with other entities
sec.list03: maintains record of participant registration and orders

fin.title: Director for Finance
fin.list00: maintains and safeguards the congress funds
fin.list01: processes and records payments for registration and miscellaneous fees
fin.list03: facilitate disbursement of funds for transactions such as downpayments, orders, etc.
fin.list04: prepares budget reports and financial statements

logistics.title: Director for Logistics
logistics.list00: scouts and arranges suitable meeting and activity venues
logistics.list01: spearheads arrangements for accommodation (lodging and food)
logistics.list03: oversees the printing of the congress booklet, certificates, etc.
logistics.list04: designs floor plan and coordinates venue decorations
